items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering
items.body: I’m currently 9 pregnant with my third, so a little bump is already showing, and this dress is AMAZING. I wasn’t sure how it would look with my early bump, but it fits beautifully and is super flattering from every angle. The material has just the right amount of stretch without feeling thin or cheap. It hugs in all the right places while still being comfortable enough to move and breathe in. The length is perfect for my height. I love the subtle pattern and the soft, form-fitting silhouette. I’ve worn a lot of dresses through multiple pregnancies, and this is easily one of my new favorites. It will be cute with a bigger bump too as it has some stretch to it! If you’re petite or newly pregnant and want something that makes you feel put together and confident, this dress is absolutely worth it. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: maggie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fitting dress
items.body: I ordered this for a wedding and it did not disappoint. It has a nice texture without being too toned. It’s a little bit long, but the wedding was formal black tie so I wore it with black suede pumps. It looks great on, it’s very forgiving and it’s probably the most comfortable dress I own. Kept this in the medium. The large was too big. Read more
items.author: Maria T

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, very comfortable and flattering.
items.body: Stunning dress, form fitting but stretchy and comfortable. I got lots of compliments on it. Travels well. Read more
items.author: Me

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I am 5'5" tall, 133 lbs, 36C bra size and Medium is perfect fit (Small would have been much too tight and uncomfortable). I purchased the Gray-Green for a December wedding and have Emerald satin shoes that match perfectly Read more
items.author: Clare S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Might want to size up at least one size.
items.body: Beautiful feminine dress. Great quality, double lined, not see through It is a body con fit! I sized up one size (small to a medium)for a better fit on me. Reference 5.3’, 128, straight figure, average bust and hip size. Read more
items.author: linda c

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loveeeee
items.body: I got this to wear to a wedding and love it. It’s so comfortable, flattering, and beautiful. Read more
items.author: Cassidy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10 buy!
items.body: Love the fit of this dress! It’s a good length, good quality and comfortable/stretchy! 10/10 recommend. Price is worth it. Read more
items.author: Hunter household essentials

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Eh
items.body: Looked more matronly than I thought it would look just based on the Amazon pictures Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve Formal Bodycon Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve Formal Bodycon Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Blue, Burgundy, Apricot, Black, Armygreen, Red, Navy, Pink, Graygreen, Browngold, Teal, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
